column4: someone please help me resolve this dependency error on Jaunty http://rafb.net/p/4j2exU35.html
no idea why that could possibly be?
dunno really
well... did you recently enable any repositories?  Or install any debs outside the official repositories?
yes .. I enabled kubuntu experimental but then I disabled it again and removed amarok
and I now I can't re-install it
removing repositories does not remove software
I removed amarok too after I installed it from the experimental repository
and I autoremoved all the deps
so ?
any suggestions ? please ?
pastebin information (i'm a bit busy atm)
basically run « apt-cache policy PACKAGE » on those packages that don't install.  Try to install just that package that is in the error and then run « apt-cache policy » on that too
I dunno why it wants to fetch the experimental packages again !
nothing :-(
did you pastebin anything?
0 upgraded, 0 newly installed, 0 to remove and 0 not upgraded.
you didn't do what I said...
I did !
basically run « apt-cache policy PACKAGE » on those packages that don't install.  Try to install just that package that is in the error and then run « apt-cache policy » on that too
that's what you need to pastebin
